public class UIFontDialog
extends UIDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Creates a font dialog for changing the font used for node labels

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Constructor Detail

UIFontDialog

public UIFontDialog(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                    UIViewPane viewPane,
                    java.awt.Font oFont,
                    int width,
                    int length,
                    boolean detail)
Constructor.

Parameters:
parent, - the parent frame for this dialog.
viewPane, - the current map.
oFont, - the last font seting saved.
width, - the node label wrap width.
length, - the length of the node label before automatically opening the detail box.
detail, - whether to automatically open the contents dialog and focus the detail box.
